name: VR Construction Lab
description: The VR Construction Lab comprises game levels where a user is tasked with assembly objectives. Each level has a scoreboard and some levels have a timer that monitors how long a player has been conducting an assembly. Teleport to any location on the job site and pick up components to build a wall. For every rightly placed item, you get a score point. Watch the introduction videos in each level and listen to the instructions. Test your memory and matching skills. Get rewards and unlock new levels of difficulty. Fun for anyone who is curious about construction assembly details. Full body motion, climb ladders, immersive audio, visual reward systems, embedded video instructions and more.
